phonebook.viewcontroller

Class ContactListTableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
      • phonebook.viewcontroller.ContactListTableModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.table.TableModel

    public class ContactListTableModel
extends javax.swing.table.AbstractTableModel
    Model object for the table performs saving/loading of contactlists and handling actions
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
